Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-34397 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.78.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-34397 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.78.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package glib is earlier than 2.78.6-1, affected by CVE-2024-34397
